title: Systematic Instructional Design and Digital Platform Integration for Enhancing Medical Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and leadership experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Practicing professionals in corporate health management services require enhanced communication competencies with a focus on practical skills. Proficiency in digital tools and data-driven decision-making applicable to real-world settings is essential

learning_goals: Analyze conflict situations in medical settings using digital simulation tools and derive effective communication strategies with over 80% accuracy
Complete a tripartite communication protocol (patient-medical staff-manager) through three or more practice projects designed in PBL format and achieve a feedback incorporation rate of over 90%
Systematically propose organizational medical communication improvements based on data analysis results using digital platforms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
